bibl.title: Greek Ostraca in the Bodleian Library at Oxford. Vol. II. Ostraca of the Roman and Byzantine Periods.
bibl.seg: Tait John Gavin and Claire Préaux, Greek Ostraca in the Bodleian Library at Oxford. Vol. II. Ostraca of the Roman and Byzantine Periods. (Graeco-Roman Memoirs. 33.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1955, 8°, xiv-434 pp.

C.R. par James Day, AJP 79 (1958) pp. 92-95. - Édouard des Places, Orientalia N.S., 25 (1956) pp. 435-436. - Naphtali Lewis, CP 53 (1958) pp. 42-43. - B.R. Rees, CR N.S., 7 (1957) pp. 79-80; JHS 77 (1957) p. 346.
